titles.title: Salem Maritime National Historical Park Redesignation and Boundary Study Act
A bill to redesignate the Salem Maritime National Historic Site in Salem, Massachusetts, as the "Salem Maritime National Historic Park", and for other purposes.
Salem Maritime National Historical Park Redesignation and Boundary Study Act
Salem Maritime National Historical Park Redesignation and Boundary Study Act
Salem Maritime National Historical Park Redesignation and Boundary Study Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Senate Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 118-284.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Manchin without amendment. With written report No. 118-152.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 304.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

bill.summary:
Salem Maritime National Historical Park Redesignation and Boundary Study Act
This bill redesignates the Salem Maritime National Historic Site in Salem, Massachusetts, as the Salem Maritime National Historical Park and directs the Department of the Interior to conduct a boundary study and report to Congress.
Such study shall be to evaluate the suitability and feasibility of including in the National Park System, as part of the Salem Maritime National Historical Park, sites and resources in the study area associated with its maritime history, coastal defenses, and military history.
